member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator
member.summary: Handles authentication for user to Authentication server. Included methods return user and provider information necessary to access the data API (i.e. token and url).

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.Authenticate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Establish connection to authenticate to xPress or OneRoster authentication server.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.RefreshToken
member.summary: Re-authenticates with xPress or OneRoster authentication server if token is expired.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.XPressLogin(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: POST to xPress authentication server with provided credentials.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.OneRosterLogin(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: POST to OneRoster authentication server with provided credentials.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.GetEndpoints(System.String)
member.summary: Details of a specific endpoint by providerId.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Authenticator.GetEndpoints
member.summary: A list of all endpoints an application is associated with and it's details.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.DecodedToken.WillTokenExpire
member.summary: Checks if an endpoint token will expire within the next 10 minutes.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Endpoint
member.summary: The Endpoint class returns data about a specific provider. This includes the provider name, href, provider id, token, and decoded token.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Endpoint.#ctor(RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressEndpoint,RicOne.Authentication.DecodedToken)
member.param: The decoded token for an xPress endpoint.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.Endpoint.#ctor(RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterEndpoint,RicOne.Authentication.DecodedToken)
member.param: The decoded token for a OneRoster endpoint.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Endpoint.Token
member.summary: Get the bearer token for API authentication.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Endpoint.DecodedToken
member.summary: Get the decoded token information on a bearer token.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterAuthResponse
member.summary: OneRosterAuthResponse type contains expires in and list of endpoints.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterAuthResponse.ExpiresIn
member.summary: Get the expired time in seconds.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterDecodedToken
member.summary: OneRosterDecodedToken type contains application id, IMS global security scope, provider id, href, issued at time, expiration time, and issuer for a OneRoster bearer token.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterEndpoint
member.summary: OneRosterEndpoint type contains endpoint name, href, providerId, access token, and token type.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterEndpoint.AccessToken
member.summary: Get the token for API authentication.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterEndpoint.TokenType
member.summary: Get the token type i.e. bearer.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressAuthResponse
member.summary: XPressAuthResponse type contains id, username, token, and list of endpoints.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressAuthResponse.Token
member.summary: Get the bearer token for API authentication.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressDecodedToken
member.summary: XPressDecodedToken type contains application id, issued at time, expiration time, and issuer for an xPress bearer token.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressEndpoint
member.summary: XPressEndpoint type contains endpoint name, href, providerId, and token.

member.name: P:RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressEndpoint.Token
member.summary: Get the token for API authentication.

member.name: T:RicOne.Authentication.TokenDecoder
member.summary: Abstract class for decoding a token.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.TokenDecoder.GetDecodedToken(RicOne.Authentication.Models.XPress.XPressDecodedToken,System.String)
member.summary: Return the decoded token information on an xPress token.

member.name: M:RicOne.Authentication.TokenDecoder.GetDecodedToken(RicOne.Authentication.Models.OneRoster.OneRosterDecodedToken,System.String)
member.summary: Return the decoded token information on an xPress token.
